articles.author: Scott Neuman
articles.title: Amazon Wins Case Against EU Regulators Over Luxembourg Taxes - NPR
articles.description: The European Commission has said the online giant got a sweetheart deal from Luxembourg that amounted to "illegal state aid" worth $303 million.
articles.content:
A view of Amazon's headquarters in Luxembourg. The online retail giant on Tuesday prevailed at the European Union's second-highest court in a major tax case.
Emmanuel Dunand/AFP via Getty Images

articles.title: 川崎フロンターレ、昨季から21戦無敗でリーグ記録タイも…ベガルタ仙台が追いつきドロー！｜Jリーグ - Goal.com
articles.description: Manchester City defender Aymeric Laporte is set to play for Spain at the European Championship, sources have confirmed to Goal.
